title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971: When performing the 'copy package' operation, the package destination is not correctly identified. Instead, it displays as '2031. org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui3. Select xxx as destination5.'. This behavior is incorrect and should be fixed.
OB: When attempting to copy a package, the destination is displayed as '2031. org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui3. Select xxx as destination5.'
EB: The correct package destination should be displayed as 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new project. 2. In the Package viewer, select a package in the project (e.g. From the context menu choose copy). 3. Observe the destination displayed when performing the copy operation.
